Title: 41765 - How to Create a Meditation Corner in Any Space
Direction: 675 words. List 4-8 tips for creating a calming corner of the room for meditation. Address decor, comfort, soothing scents, and music, mantras, or soothing background noise. Write for an audience interested in home decor and improvement. Include the AT in a section about using sound canceling earbuds for calming music and sounds.
Extra Writer Notes: Example AT: listen to calming music on sound canceling earbuds

Title: 41886 - # Features That Do Matter on a Digital Camera
Direction: 675 words. Explain that people think that more features equals better camera, when this really isn't true. Some features don't add much value to cameras, why others are an absolute must. Then, list 4-8 features that actually matter when choosing a digital camera. It should be easy to incorporate the client link anywhere. Your audience is tech savvy people who are in the market for a new digital camera. Please try to naturally link to other products throughout the article in order to make the Sony link less obvious.
Extra Writer Notes: Example AT: one of Sony's best digital cameras

Title: 41887 - How to Take Top-Notch Photos for Your Blog
Direction: 675 words. List 4-8 tips for getting good pictures for a blog. Address the unique needs of photos that are intended for the internet, including tips on making them shareable, relevant, and eye-catching on all mediums. Write for a diverse audience interested in finding out the latest tips and trends. Include the AT in a section on choosing the right camera.
Extra Writer Notes: Example AT: choosing the best digital camera from Sony
